name: Factory Control
description:
There is more than one way to finish the game? 

In Factory Control you play as a factory operator who really doesn’t know what they’re doing. However, you still try your best.

This game was designed by Xavier Ponds as a submission to the WOWIE! 2.0 game jam with the theme ‘Intentional Bugs’. The theme was used in the game through the factory controls, which can be set to ridiculous values that results in a little destruction.

Bugs can appear by not clamping your values correctly and this is what we see occur in the game! Try Leaving the controls on max for a while???

The game runs for about 3-4 min and is simply a fun little scene, I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Arrow Keys.

WOWIE!!!!!!!
